meanings.definition: The act of striking over something.
meanings.sent1: Her strikeovers on the paper were messy.
meanings.sent2: I could see the strikeovers on the document.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's strikeovers on the whiteboard were crooked.
meanings.sent4: The strikeovers on the canvas added depth to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The strikeovers on the wall showed where the old paint had been.

meanings.definition: A mark made by striking over something.
meanings.sent1: The strikeovers on the page were dark.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the strikeovers on the table.
meanings.sent3: The cat left tiny strikeovers on the floor with its paws.
meanings.sent4: The strikeovers on the map indicated important locations.
meanings.sent5: The strikeovers on the tree trunk showed years of growth rings.

meanings.sent1: She had to strikeovers the incorrect answers.
meanings.sent2: He carefully strikeovers the wrong numbers.
meanings.sent3: The chef strikeovers the mistake in the recipe with ease.
meanings.sent4: The waves strikeovers the footprints on the sand.
meanings.sent5: The wind strikeovers the leaves off the trees in autumn.
